com.esri.gpt.framework.security.identity.local
Class SimpleIdentityAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.esri.gpt.framework.security.identity.IdentityAdapter
      com.esri.gpt.framework.security.identity.local.SimpleIdentityAdapter

public class SimpleIdentityAdapter
extends IdentityAdapter

Identity adapter for a simple installation of one known user (the administrator).

          Default constructor.
